subject: Re: JUnit 4 with Ant & Eclipse
msgSnippet: ... Works just fine for me, without any special attribute or something. What does your task look like? Cheers, Ilja
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "craig.noah2008" <craig.noah2008@...>
wrote:

> Is it possible there's a bug in the <junit> ant task that is looking
> only for JUnit3 tests? Does the task need a version attribute to get
> it to use JUnit4 tests?

Works just fine for me, without any special attribute or something.

What does your task look like?

Cheers, Ilja
